summary: TAKATA RECALL - IN APRIL 2016, VW INFORMED ME THAT THE DRIVER'S SIDE AIRBAG WAS DEFECTIVE AND POTENTIALLY DANGEROUS. TODAY (JULY 5, 2017) I CALLED THE VW DEALER, AND THE VW DEALER CLAIMS THE PARTS FOR THE AIRBAG REPAIR WILL NOT BE AVAILABLE UNTIL SEPT. 30, 2017. THAT MEANS I WILL HAVE BEEN DRIVING AN UNSAFE CAR FOR 18 MONTHS. CAN NHTSA GET VW TO DO THE REPAIRS SOONER?
